浛字的基本解释

浛
hán
古同“涵”（ａ．沉没；ｂ．涵道；涵洞）。
广大：“浛天荡荡望沧沧。”

浛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hàn］
［《廣韻》胡紺切，去勘，匣。］
亦作“淊3”。
水与泥相掺和。
[②]［hán］
(1)同“涵”。沉浸。
(2)涵洞。

浛字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　浛； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页623第24
【廣韻】【集韻】?胡紺切，音憾。【玉篇】水和泥也。　又【集韻】姑南切，音弇。與淦同。詳淦字註。　又【集韻】胡南切，音含。【揚子·方言】沈也。或作??淊淦澏。【六書故】?別作浛?。【王子年·拾遺記】浛天蕩蕩望蒼蒼。　又地名。【正字通】浛洸，古英州屬縣。今連州江口之上有浛洸口，屬韶州英德縣。

浛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
浛字的起名意思

浛是个多音字，念hán时，是水名和地名用字，也有广大的意思。念hàn时，意指水与泥相掺和。

Xun
Basic explanation of words
Xun
hán
Ancient Tong "culvert" (a. sinking; b. culvert; culvert).
Vastness: "The sky is dangling and looking at the Cangcang."
Xun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hàn］
["Guangyun" Hu Jin cut, went to survey, Xie. ]
Also known as "Flooded 3".
Water is mixed with mud.
[②]［hán］
(1) Same as "han". Immersed.
(2) Culvert.
Xun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[First Collection] [Water Word Department] 　浛; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 623 24
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hu Chong cut, sound regretful. [Jade articles] Water and mud are also.　[Jiyun] Gunan cut, sound 弇. Same as Gan. Detailed notes on the words.　[Jiyun] Hu Nanqie, sound contains. [Yangtze Dialect] Shen Ye. Or as a flood. [Six Books]? Don’t make a mistake. 【The Year of the Prince·Supplementary Notes】The sky is dangling and looking at the sky.　Also place name. [Zhengzitong] Xun Tao, a county in ancient Yingzhou. Nowadays, there is Xunzhukou above Lianzhou River Mouth, which belongs to Yingde County, Shaozhou.
Xun
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Korean Ming Dynasty
Old glyph
Xun
Name meaning
Xun is a polyphonic character. When pronounced hán, it is the name of water and place, and it also has a broad meaning. When saying hàn, it means mixing water and mud.
hán
собств. Хань, в геогр. названиях, напр.: 浛光
